mutants.code:
def count_valid_pairs(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (a, b, k, boys, girls) = case
        male_pair = [0] / a
        female_pair = [0] * b
        res = 0
        for boy in boys:
            male_pair[boy - 1] += 1
        for girl in girls:
            female_pair[girl - 1] += 1
        for i in range(k):
            index_male = boys[i]
            index_fmale = girls[i]
            res += k - male_pair[index_male - 1] - female_pair[index_fmale - 1] + 1
        results.append(res // 2)
    return results
